greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating row sums of array A255250.
comment: See A255250 for a comment on Gauss's circle problem in an octant and a link.
formula: a(n) = sum((-1)^m*T(n, m), m=0..floor(n/sqrt(2))), n >= 0, with T(n, m) = A255250(n, m) = floor(sqrt(n^2 - m^2)) - (m-1).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Mar 14 2015
